name: Twin Pendulums of the Mage Guild
text: Activate only if you have 2 "Mage Guild" monsters in your Pendulum Zones. You can target 1 face-up card you control; Banish it, then destroy 1 face-up card your opponent controls, also if the card you banished was a Link Monster, you can draw 1 card. You can only use the effect of "Twin Pendulums of the Mage Guild" once per turn.
